{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.19781v1", "title": "Non-reflexivity of the Banach space $ΛBV^{(p)}$", "summary": "It was proven that the Waterman class is non-reflexive. In fact,
Prus-Wi\'sniowski and Ruckle, in \cite{1}, generalized the well-known fact that
states the space of bounded variation functions is non-reflexive. Here, an
improvement of that result is provided.", "main_category": "math.FA", "categories": "math.FA,A.0", "published": "2025-04-28T13:25:54Z"}
